channel.title: CVE Feed for NooTheme -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NooTheme -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37928|2024-07-12T14:00:51.146Z -- nootheme -- jobmonster
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in NooTheme Jobmonster allows File Manipulation.This issue affects Jobmonster: from n/a through 4.7.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-37927|2024-07-12T13:59:18.641Z -- nootheme -- jobmonster
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in NooTheme Jobmonster allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Jobmonster: from n/a through 4.7.0.
